mapper.select: SELECT m.t_menu_pkid menuPkId, m.t_menu_name menuName, m.t_menu_description descr,m.t_menu_main_icon mainIcon FROM t_menu m WHERE m.t_menu_delete = 0 AND m.t_menu_user_pkid = #{userPkId}

SELECT DISTINCT m.t_menu_pkid menuPkId, m.t_menu_name menuName, m.t_menu_description descr ,m.t_menu_user_pkid userPkId,m.t_menu_main_icon mainIcon ,m.t_menu_udt udt FROM t_menu m LEFT JOIN t_comment c ON c.t_comment_menu_pkid = m.t_menu_pkid WHERE m.t_menu_delete = 0 AND c.t_comment_delete = 0 AND c.t_comment_user_pkid = #{userPkId} ORDER BY udt DESC

SELECT COUNT(t_like_menu_pkid) likes ,t_like_menu_pkid menuPkId ,m.t_menu_name menuName ,m.t_menu_description descr, m.t_menu_main_icon mainIcon,m.t_menu_user_pkid userPkId FROM t_like l LEFT JOIN t_menu m ON l.t_like_menu_pkid = m.t_menu_pkid WHERE t_like_menu_pkid > 0 AND t_like_delete = 0 GROUP BY menuPkId ORDER BY likes DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT COUNT(t_collect_menu_pkid) collects ,c.t_collect_menu_pkid menuPkId,m.t_menu_name menuName ,m.t_menu_description descr, m.t_menu_main_icon mainIcon,m.t_menu_user_pkid userPkId FROM t_collect c LEFT JOIN t_menu m ON m.t_menu_pkid = c.t_collect_menu_pkid WHERE t_collect_cancel =0 GROUP BY menuPkId ORDER BY collects DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT t_menu_pkid menuPkId,t_menu_name menuName ,t_menu_description descr ,t_menu_main_icon mainIcon,t_menu_user_pkid userPkId FROM t_menu ORDER BY t_menu_look_times DESC LIMIT 10
